website_summaries.verdict: An affordably priced bottom-freezer appliance with 9.1 cu. ft., which will be enough space for some but not enough for others.
pros: Door has integrated handle, which some will appreciate for the clean line it creates
cons: Freezer shelf is wire, which some may not like
Capacity is not as large as that of a full-size refrigerator/freezer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size, holds cold temp even
customer_reviews.text: Have had this for only a couple weeks but so far so good. It’s good size for one or two ppl and is functioning well so far - no freezing spots in the fridge area, even temp etc. will update if anything goes wrong. I’m very happy with size of this and how it functions.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Soles

customer_reviews.title: Don't ever buy this brand.
customer_reviews.text: Delivered inoperable -- will not cool even though unit powers up and compressor runs (refrigerant leak anyone?). Paperwork says call manufacturer (Danby, a corporation in Canada fronting this Chinese product), so I did. Multiple times. Each time I got to wait more than 20 minutes to speak to a customer service rep. In each case, CSR was unable to address the problem, including directing me to service shops that do not service my area. So I have a new, non-working refrigerator with no one able to work on it. Exploring return to Amazon now.
customer_reviews.author: Howard

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Fridge
customer_reviews.text: We bought this fridge almost a year ago and it doesn't do anything a fridge is supposed to do. It worked fine the first month we used it. After only a month, it stopped producing any cool air. At this point, it's basically a glorified cooler. On top of this, we've noticed recently that the door does not seal all the way thus letting cool air escape. We've moved every item inside thinking maybe the door was jammed, but it hasn't changed anything. We think it's because the magnet is weak or simply doesn't work. We are very disappointed with this purchase. Please don't waste over $600 on this garbage! It's been nothing but trouble since we've bought it!
customer_reviews.author: Kate Georgia

customer_reviews.title: PRICE EQUALS QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: We do like the product for its size and upper refrigerator compartment. The refrigerator has nice glass shelves with interior light. The door could use more shelving, if soda container holder was removed. The freezer basket does not slide well and is poor storage space, would rather have another shelve and door storage. We are having a problem removing glue marks left on doors after removing plastic packaging film. The refrigerator does make weird sounds while running, but the compressor is relative quiet. Power usage is unknown since we have not received a power bill since plugged in. Delivery of product was late, mostly by second carrier. Other wise we are happy with the product, hopefully it will last.
customer_reviews.author: woody

customer_reviews.title: Good Refrigerator
customer_reviews.text: Fridge was purchase for my business and it serves it purchase. Cannot beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: Vivi

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Came damaged trying to have door replaced but noone responds to several emails. Need help!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tonna Gartrell

customer_reviews.title: Excellent... Makes noise
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Packaging and delivery was flawless. Space and layout inside is great. Perfect size and look. Zero complaints. Edit: six months on. Noisy. When the compressor comes on I sometimes mistake the sound for someone mowing the lawn next door. That’s exactly what it sounds like
customer_reviews.author: Rock Ottoman

customer_reviews.title: So far a good product
customer_reviews.text: Can't answer the efficiency or value for at least a year. As advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Morrow

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and space
customer_reviews.text: Good for a house of 2 We have a “tiny house” and it’s perfect for us and our space. I wanted a fridge with the freezer on the bottom and this is made exactly for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Cisco

customer_reviews.title: Freezer has to be turned all the way down to freeze ice.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this because we were concerned about food shortages during the so-called pandemic. We got it because of its freezer capacity and it helps keep our main refrigerator more organized. I was able to level it in our garage, after a fashion. The floor isn't even both side to side and front and back, so the two levelers in front got it close, but not dead on level.
customer_reviews.author: Crash and Burn

customer_reviews.title: cute but sweats
customer_reviews.text: This fridge is the perfect size for our porch area for extra food items. And it's cute - adorable even :) - BUT sitting in the open air, it does sweat!!! Sad. Our old fridge which died did not sweat like this. Any ideas how to fix or prevent (other than moving indoors?-lol).
customer_reviews.author: Brenda P. Tapp

customer_reviews.title: Going into the trash bin, along with my spoiled food.
customer_reviews.text: Received a defective fridge. Amazon will not accept returns. Getting the run around by customer service at Danby. Won’t get colder than 60°
customer_reviews.author: RCCarSteve

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Was a little concerned based on reviews, but it’s a great looking perfect size refrigerator that came very fast.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: Danby refrigerator
customer_reviews.text: This 9.2 cu ft bottom freezer refrigerator is great, I bought it as the second refrigerator. It is good for 1-2 persons or as an add on for a bigger family.
customer_reviews.author: Henry's dad

customer_reviews.title: Nice Look and Feel and Has Plenty of Space!
customer_reviews.text: It is a beautiful refrigerator and offers plenty of room.
customer_reviews.author: Y. Qiu (Dr.Q)

customer_reviews.title: Great Size
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect "extra" refrigerator and freezer. Typical mini-fridges don't have ample freezer space, which is why I bought this one for my office. It works great and have been very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Cindi Mills

customer_reviews.title: The style and size are perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: I've has this running for a month now and no complaints. The style and size are perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Attessa

customer_reviews.title: not cold enough
customer_reviews.text: Size is good for my needs.Freezer works fine but I have the refrigerator setting set to max and it doesn,t get any colder than 42-44 degrees. I would send it back if it wasn't such a pain in the ***.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen A. Palazzo

customer_reviews.title: Damaged merchandise
customer_reviews.text: Inspected box at delivery, no signs of damage. Opened box, & damage to exterior back corner & interior liner cracked.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mid-range quality but dependable and best for the price
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly good; quality matches price. Tolerances on door hinges are about 2mm too much so it feels a bit cheap, and condenser motor rattles something in back that amplifies the sound occasionally so the it wakes anyone sleeping in proximity. Sanyo and LG alternatives are higher quality, but at least $200 more.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Way too noisy
customer_reviews.text: I have this fridge in my small house . It is so loud I can hear it creaking and crackling in every room. It is a constant and unsettling noise. Had a repairman come twice and he couldn’t fix it. Sometimes the refrigerator part just shuts off for hours at a time. The freezer works fine. The size is perfect for my small family but overall I give it one star because of the incessant noise.
customer_reviews.author: Larissa Koerner

customer_reviews.title: Bad customer service
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased aa gift to me. It was damaged upon arrival and no one to call to get it replaced
customer_reviews.author: Nettie

customer_reviews.title: ... owned this frig for over 10 yeara and have enjoyed it. I only had a couple things they ...
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this frig for over 10 yeara and have enjoyed it. I only had a couple things they could do to emprove on it would make the stainless ether look like it was on the sides and have an ice maker option. Ether than that it been great thank you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: We have nothing but trouble with this product it finally failed after 2 years of service
customer_reviews.author: terry portwood

product_meta.title: 9.2 Cu. Ft. Bottom Mount Freezer- Black with Stainless Steel
product_meta.description: Color:Stainless SteelYou’ll never have to worry about cooling space again with this deluxe bottom-mount apartment refrigerator from Danby. This model has it all including a clear vegetable crisper with glass cover, a convenient CanStor beverage dispenser, two adjustable glass shelves, three integrated door shelves, and an adjustable wire freezer shelf. Although this versatile unit stands just under 60 inches tall and 24 inches in width it offers 9.2 cubic feet (260 liters) of storage area. Your electricity bills will get a much-needed break since this efficient appliance comes with the coveted Energy Star designation and the stylish spotless-steel finish means it’s easy to keep clean. The state-of-the-art frost-free operating system is designed for improved food preservation and effortless maintenance while the bright interior LED light is designed to illuminate without adding heat. In addition, the door comes with an integrated handle and it can be adjusted for left or right-handed opening due to the smart reversible-hinge design. This spacious unit also comes with a 12-month warranty on parts and labor with handy in-home service.
feature_bullets: You’ll never have to worry about cooling space again with this deluxe bottom-mount apartment refrigerator from Danby
In addition, the door comes with an integrated handle and it can be adjusted for left or right-handed opening due to the smart reversible-hinge design
Manufactured in China. Spotless steel door finish - looks identical to real stainless steel but without the smudging
Frost free operation provides hassle free maintenance and improved food preservation

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars47 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
